title: Auxiliary & Alumni Membership | Mekor 3
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Auxiliary & Alumni Membership Mekor Alumni Membership ~ 5785 ~ ​2024/2025 ​Every Mekor alumnus has a unique share in the zechut (merit) of our shul's accomplishments. We invite you to engage with us on a deeper level by becoming an official Mekor member or auxiliary member. As you know, many people join Mekor as students or early in their professional careers, sometimes with limited financial means. We therefore rely on the generosity and the lasting commitment of our alumni population to ensure that our shul will continue to thrive. Auxiliary Mekor Membership This is available to alumni and others who live outside the Philadelphia region, at the following rates. Auxiliary Rates Get Auxiliary Membership Family/couple $900 Single Adult $450 Single Student $225 Full Mekor Membership Full Membership Rates Family/couple $1800 Single Adult $900 Single Student $450 Please note: auxiliary membership does not include High Holiday seats. To join, please email the shul to request membership, and make payment online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, or regular PayPal), or by mailing or by mailing a check payable to Mekor Habracha, c/o Ellen Geller, 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102. (Please add service fees for Flipcause.) Please email the shul to let us know about your donation and any dedication you'd like to make. ​WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue

    Support Mekor

    Auxiliary & Alumni Membership

    Mekor Alumni Membership 

    ~ 5785 ~
    ​2024/2025

    ​Every Mekor alumnus has a unique share in the zechut (merit) of our shul's accomplishments.  We invite you to engage with us on a deeper level by becoming an official Mekor member or auxiliary member.  As you know, many people join Mekor as students or early in their professional careers, sometimes with limited financial means.   We therefore rely on the generosity and the lasting commitment of our alumni population to ensure that our shul will continue to thrive.
     

    Auxiliary Mekor Membership

    This is available to alumni and others who live outside the Philadelphia region, at the following rates.

    Auxiliary Rates 
    Get Auxiliary Membership

    • Family/couple $900

    • Single Adult  $450

    • Single Student $225

    Full Mekor Membership 

    Full Membership Rates 

    • Family/couple $1800

    • Single Adult  $900

    • Single Student  $450

    Please note: auxiliary membership does not include High Holiday seats.

    To join, please email the shul to request membership, and make payment online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, or regular PayPal), or by mailing or by mailing a check payable to Mekor Habracha, c/o Ellen Geller, 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102. (Please add service fees for Flipcause.) Please email the shul to let us know about your donation and any dedication you'd like to make.

    ​WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
    Mekor Habracha
    Center City Synagogue

    (215) 525-4246

    admin@mekorhabracha.org

    ​

    1500 Walnut St Suite 206

    Philadelphia, PA 19102
